title: Stylish Wellington Hutt Valley Retreat near Te Awa Kairangi
description:
Discover the beauty of New Zealand's capital city with a stay at this stylish hotel. This chic retreat is ideally located in the lush Lower Hutt region, an outdoor haven filled with charming walking and cycling trails, expansive coastal views and hills where wild native kiwi roam. 

A 15-minute drive to the city's capital and the renowned Te Papa Museum, the vibrant Cuba Street and the stunning Wellington Waterfront, this is the perfect base. In between exploring, retreat to your elegant room and feel right at home. Energise at the onsite fitness centre, dine at the onsite restaurant or explore the beautiful surrounds.
offer_address: 15 Queens Drive, Hutt Central, Lower Hutt, Wellington 5010, New Zealand
